output_json.summary: Information Technology Leader with 5 years of IT and security experience, specializing in governance, strategy, and security operations.

description: Worked with multiple departments and executive teams to ensure a timely and complete roll-out of product.
Served as a technical lead and a tier 2 escalation resource for multiple applications and operating systems.
Supported Windows (XP and 7), Linux (Red Hat), and Mac (OSX).
Administered, troubleshooted, reclaimed, and issued RSA soft and hard tokens.
Led the executive support team providing 'white-glove' support for director level and above.
Active Directory administration ranging from SSO integration to forest creation, to simple user administration.
Researched and resolved AD issues relating to advanced administration and GPO creation.
Provided remote and local support to an employee base of over 7000 employees, contractors, and consultants.
Resolved complex hardware and software issues, served as tier 2 and 3 support when needed.
Utilized multiple ticketing systems to track customer issues, including Numara Footprints and Kayako.
Provisioned, troubleshot, and repaired laptops, desktops, MiFi's, and corporate cellular phones.
Managed the network operations center servicing upwards of 100 clients over multiple geographic locations.
Responsible for Enterprise Information Security and Architecture, Risk Management and Compliance.
Understood business and security requirements, designed architecture and applied Security Technologies to mitigate risk and ensure compliance with SolarCity policies and standards.
Implemented and administered forensic imaging enterprise solution.
Created and maintained IT SOX Governance and Compliance program.
Outstanding mentoring skills, coached junior and senior personnel.
Interdepartmental mediator focused on converting identified risks into enterprise-level solutions.
Managed Information Security projects including planning and development of new processes and technologies.

projects.description: Understanding business and security requirements, designing architecture and applying Security Technologies to mitigate risk and ensure compliance with SolarCity policies and standards.
